title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this part: (a) The terms employee and employer shall be
as those terms are defined in Section
190
of the Labor

Law. (b) Permission shall mean an
express, advance, authorization given voluntarily by the employee, and
permission may be withdrawn by an employee at any time. A writing shall not be
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
194-1.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
